description: Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

developer: Bank of Cyprus Public Company Ltd
description:
Our app is designed to make your everyday banking easier and faster and perform your queries and transactions securely at a touch of a finger.
 
BENEFITS & FEATURES
• Login using your User ID and the 6-digit Passcode or using biometrics (available on compatible devices as an alternative)
• Check your balances using the convenient “Home” page, where connected accounts are separated per account type (current accounts/saving accounts/cards/loans)
• View a snapshot of your finances and get useful insights such as your net worth and scheduled payments
• View your Account Details for connected accounts i.e Interest Rates, IBAN (with an option to share), Hold Amounts, Uncleared Cheques etc .
• Check your account’s Transaction History with a convenient filter option to minimize the results and trace a specific transaction
• Transfer funds between your accounts or to any Bank of Cyprus customer. For your convenience, you may use your predefined templates
• Carry out fast and easy QuickPay mobile payments to Bank of Cyprus customers, up to €250 per day, using the beneficiary’s mobile number or account/card number. Also available for payments that exceed the €250 daily limit, with the use of a Digipass. (only for individuals)
• Set your favourite Quickpay contacts and have them available for selection with just one tap
• Transfer funds to other local banks or abroad (SEPA & SWIFT) either to new or to account auto-saved beneficiaries
• Connect accounts held with Banking institutions and view information about those accounts (for supported banks only)
• Open eFixed Deposit (in euro and other currencies) and eNotice accounts
• Apply for an eCredit Card
• If you are a business subscriber with predefined multiple signatures (schema), Approve/Decline your Pending Transactions
• Update your contact information (phone numbers, email). Digipass OTP is required
• Get images of cheques you issued or that you deposited
• Pay your utility bills
• Open a standing order via the Transfer option as a repeated payment and a direct debit for your credit card
• View the status of your transactions performed via 1bank channels
• Personalise the app by uploading a picture of your choice or setting up account alias
•  View the “Notices” sent by the Bank from time to time, to keep up with our news and much more.

The Bank of Cyprus Mobile Application is offered free of charge, however 1bank Commission & Charges may apply for your transactions.

In case you don’t have 1bank credentials, please visit http://www.bankofcyprus.com.cy/en-gb/retail/ebankingnew/application-form/apply/ to find out more or contact us on 800 00 800 or +357 22 128000 if calling from abroad, Monday to Friday between 07:45 and 18:00, Saturday and Sunday between 09:00 and 17:00.

IMPORTANT TO KNOW
• To have access to the full range of features and the latest enhancements, please ensure that you have the latest version of the Bank of Cyprus App Installed on your device and Notifications are enabled
• The Bank of Cyprus App is offered in Greek, English and Russian.
• In case you forgot your credentials, please visit http://www.bankofcyprus.com.cy/home-gr/Internet-Banking_gr/1bank/forgot_your_passcode/ and learn how you can retrieve them.

SECURITY
Bank of Cyprus will never ask you for any personal details through emails, pop-up windows and banners.
If you receive an email or other electronic communication asking you to enter or confirm your Βank of Cyprus personal details, please do not reply as it may be fraudulent. Please forward any suspicious emails to: abuse@bankofcyprus.com

If you think you may have revealed your personal details please contact us immediately.

The online payment portal JCCsmart.com is the only integrated platform in the Cypriot market that
allows for real-time payments. Now available in the form of an app.
Its purpose is to facilitate and develop electronic commerce in Cyprus by providing integrated
solutions tailored to each organization’s needs, through a secure and technologically advanced
environment.
Download the JCCsmart application and start paying your bills, subscriptions and fees safely to over
800 registered organisations.
You can save your card details in order to pay easily any outstanding invoice from the comfort of your
office / home, keeping track of your payments history.

Simple, smart banking wherever you are. 

• Biometric login - Biometric login
• Contact Pay - Easy and instant payments to your smartphone’s contacts, from your bank accounts
• Seamless approvals - No more 8-digit SMS OTP! Approving transfers are as easy as a fingerprint or a face away

Banking made simple 
Keep track of every transaction that comes in and out of your bank account or get a daily balance every morning with real-time push notifications.  

Protecting you is our priority  
Biometric identification and advanced 3DS Secure technology so you can rest assured you’re safe when making purchases in stores and online. Always in control with full access over your cards and the ability to freeze it in case it’s missing.

Our brand new Mobile App is available, offering new features which help you control your money and make transactions anywhere in the world safely 24 hours a day, 365 days per year. 

Our functionality includes the following:
Log In using biometrics or push notification
Customize your Log In page to show specific accounts
Manage accounts and check balances
View statements and download them in several formats
Make transfers locally and abroad using the fastest and cheapest options
Legal Entities can use multiple signatures and approvals
Control your Cards including temporarily blocking a card
Manage and view your Cheques (issued or deposited)
Perform Tax Payments
Make Bill Payments 
Device Management – handle your registered devices
Send Secure Messages to the Bank including attachments
Use Offline signature, in order to send written instructions to the Bank
Enhanced Security

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Send Money Abroad – Fast, Safe & Affordable

Send money to your family and friends quickly and affordably with Taptap Send. Whether you’re supporting loved ones, covering school fees, or helping out in times of need, TapTap Send makes it easy to transfer money straight from your smartphone — no agent visits, no long waits.

With TapTap Send, you can transfer money across Africa, Asia, Latin America, and beyond in just a few taps. We offer low fees, excellent exchange rates, and multiple ways to receive money — including mobile wallets, bank transfers, and cash pickup. You can send money directly from your debit card or bank account (depending on your location)

Why use TapTap Send to send money?

- Fast money transfers – most transfers arrive in minutes

- Low-cost transfers – no hidden fees when you send money

- Great exchange rates – we negotiate daily to offer you more value when you transfer funds

…and many more. Explore the full list at taptapsend.com.

TapTap Send puts safety first. Our platform is PCI-compliant, encrypted, and designed with multiple levels of security to protect your personal and financial information. We never store your card details, and we never sell your personal data.

Our team comes from the communities we serve and speaks over 30 languages. We understand the challenges of sending money internationally and are here to make every money transfer easier, faster, and more affordable. If you ever need support, our friendly team is just an email away at support@taptapsend.com.

Our Mission
We believe that diaspora communities deserve fast, secure, and fair ways to send money home. For too long, sending money internationally has been expensive and difficult. We’re changing that — by lowering costs, reducing delays, and improving your experience every time you transfer money.

Download TapTap Send and start sending money today.
Transfer money home — fast, safe, and stress-free.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.

Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

Take your finances further with the account designed for efficiency, and built for business.

Revolut Business is the all-in-one account that helps you manage your business finances with less admin and lower costs. Track your spend, issue corporate cards, grow your savings, accept payments, and more.

Whether you're starting out or scaling up, access all the tools you need to run your business in one place, from global payments and multi-currency accounts, to spend management tools and more. See for yourself why 20k+ new businesses join us every month.

Features 

Get started in minutes:
Apply directly through the mobile app by filling out a short form — it only takes about 10 minutes. 

Pay suppliers and teams globally:
Manage money in 35+ currencies, across 150+ countries — and save as you exchange at the interbank rate (within plan allowance, during market hours). 

Simplify and control team spend:
Issue physical and virtual cards to your team anywhere in the world, and stay on top of your finances with spend limits and custom approval flows.

Automate expense management:
Capture receipts and categorise transactions seamlessly. Track team spend and export data to your accounting software to reconcile instantly. 

Accept payments with ease:
Take payments online, in person, or via invoice. Use Payment Links, Revolut Pay, QR codes, Tap to Pay on iPhone, card readers, and more — all with competitive fees and no hidden costs. T&Cs apply

Put your money to work:
Earn great rates with interest paid daily on your Savings balance. Withdraw anytime with no fees. Rates vary per plan. Savings T&Cs apply.

Plan for your business’ future:
Dive into analytics to track and forecast spend with precision. Manage all your companies, branches, and business entities from one app as your business grows. 

Download Revolut Business and simplify how you manage your company’s money.

This description is only relevant for UK businesses.

Streamline your business with our mobile banking app, designed exclusively for authorisations and approvals. 
Experience secure, efficient, and hassle-free management of your financial transactions on the go.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

The Eurobank Mobile App is updated with smart functionality, offering a user experience driven by your own needs.
 
Discover its possibilities:
 
All your options in one screen: You will find everything you need on dashboard, including all your accounts’ balance, current month’s income and expenses, details for each of your accounts and cards separately, and the €pistrofi amount you have earned through purchases with Eurobank cards.
You can also access your Loan, Investment, and Insurance products just with a swipe left from dashboard.
Protect your privacy from others: New feature to hide or unhide amounts enabled with a single gesture.
Quick access to transactions: You can initiate your transactional activity by selecting any of the three options available on top of dashboard or by selecting the red button anywhere on the Eurobank Mobile App. Easy access to Transfer funds, Bill Payments, IRIS Payments, “Favourite transactions”, Standing Orders.
Card management: Manage your cards directly from your dashboard. You can activate, pay, load, and temporarily deactivate your cards.
Contacts: Ability to access, not only the contacts saved on your phone device, but also all the contacts you keep at your e-Banking account in order to easily complete your transactions.
Products and Services: Easy access to a wide variety of online products for your digital purchases by selecting “Products” at the bottom of your dashboard.

If your business is a legal entity, please download the Eurobank Business App.
If you are not a Eurobank customer yet, you can open an account in 15 minutes without having to physically visit our stores.

Alpha Mobile Banking comes always updated, offering you the ultimate flexibility and autonomy in managing your finances. Login by using Pin, Face ID or Touch ID, and get informed on your products, perform transactions and get access to useful services and tools from your iPhone or iPad.

Bank's Rewards Scheme app. If you are a cardholder, you can now earn cashback rewards with every purchase at the merchants participating in Mple.
Download the app, find out more about your rewards, the participating merchants, the special offers, keep track of your wallet’s balance and set your cashback preferences.

developer: Bank of Cyprus Public Company Ltd
description:
Introducing Joey, a super helpful banking app designed exclusively for kids and teens aged 9 to 17 under parental guidance with its Visa debit card.

Our aim is to empower teenagers to become financially savvy, providing them with the necessary tools to handle money safely and responsibly as they grow up. 

We believe that achieving financial independence is a gradual process, best undertaken with parental support.

Meet Joey: an intuitive, user-friendly app that fits right into family life, making it easier for teens to manage money as they transition into smarter spenders. With the app, teens can spend, save money, and keep track of the money, while parents can securely send money for their teen(s) to use under their watchful eye.

Joey card, a VISA debit card, is widely accepted both in stores and online and allows teens to take out cash from ATMs — all without worrying about them spending more than the amount credited in the card.
And guess what? Joey is simple, secure, and fun to use. Come join us today for a next-generation money management experience!

Teen Benefits
+ Buy stuff using the Joey card in stores and/or online.
+ Add Joey card to Apple/Google (age rules apply).
+ Keep an eye on what they're spending.
+ Get pocket money/allowance straight to your Joey card.
+ Spend money using your card.
+ Make quick contactless payments.
+ Take out cash from ATMs.
+ See spending history and habits.
+ Freeze / unfreeze Joey card anytime.
+ Get instant alerts.
+ Learn by spending and managing money.
+ Use it easily in a cashless world.
+ Request money from your parent/guardian whenever you need it.
+ Get ready for life outside.


Parent/Guardian Benefits
+ Send money to teens right away.
+ Set up regular pocket money/allowance easily.
+ Easily manage Joey on the move.
+ Easily freeze or unfreeze the Joey card with a simple tap if it's lost or misplaced.
+ Specific merchants that aren't suitable for teens under 18, as considered by the Bank of Cyprus, are blocked.
+ Decide if the Joey card can be used online or for cash withdrawals at ATMs.
+ See the PIN for the Joey card.
+ Get real-time notifications to keep an eye on your teen's spending.
+ Have this so important money talks with your family.
+ Your teens will be better prepared for what’s ahead.
+ Easy to use.


Starting is simple!

For teens
+ Download the Joey app.
+ Connect with your parent/guardian.
+ Add your Joey card to Apple Pay/Google Pay to begin spending right away (with minimum age restriction).
+ Enjoy Joey!

For Parents:
+ Guide your teen to download the Joey app.
+ Sign up for Joey, add your teen, request Joey card and show the QR code to the teen - all through the Bank of Cyprus mobile app.

No bank account or credit card? No problem. 

Download the PaysafeCard app and explore how you can use your cash online, get gift cards or use our app as a wallet with your personal debit Mastercard and IBAN.  
 
Access everything you need in a single tap. 

PaysafeCard
Register for free and pay with cash online. 
- Sign up (16+) and make payments within minutes of downloading the app Buy a prepaid code in 600.000+ sales outlets worldwide  
- Get a PaysafeCard code from the app. Simply select the payment method of your choice and buy one from the comfort of your own home at no additional cost 
- Use your PaysafeCard balance on over 3,500 websites including your favorite igaming and entertainment sites by entering your login details at the checkout  
- Stay safe by not sharing personal and financial details online   
- Manage your balance conveniently in in the app 
- Keep control of your costs through prepaid payments  

Account & Card*
Upgrade to Account & Card, the alternative to your bank account. Activate our feature online or in the app today to receive your debit Mastercard and your personal IBAN. 
- Register an account in minutes (18+)   
- Instant SEPA bank transfers  
- Physical & virtual debit Mastercards  
- Worldwide payments with your card including Apple Pay  
- Cash withdrawals at any ATM  
- Cash deposits via PaysafeCard and Paysafecash  
- Keep track of your transactions 

Gift Card Shop
Buy vouchers for your favourite shops, like the PlayStation Store, XBox, Twitch, Netflix, Zalando and more. Give it to your loved ones or simply use it to protect your payment details online.  

Get your PaysafeCard prepaid codes without leaving your house. Simply buy them online without any extra fees.  

Questions
 
Please contact info@paysafecard.com or visit our website www.paysafecard.com for more information, assistance and our terms and conditions. You can also find us on Facebook, X and Instagram: @paysafecard  

Say goodbye to multiple apps and download PaysafeCard to simplify your finances.  

*Available in selected countries

Revolut is the money app designed to spend, save, and set money aside.

What's in store:
• Get your own customisable debit card and virtual cards to add to your Apple or Google Wallet (personalisation fees may apply)
• Send money between friends on Revolut (minimum age restriction applies)
• Receive money from everyone — even if they’re not on Revolut — with Payment Links
• Save and earn with a Savings account
• Get a 360º view of your money with Analytics
• If you’re in the UK, you can move to the main app once you turn 16

 
How does it work?
1. Download this app and create an account (if you're below the age of data consent, your parent will need to create an account for you from their Revolut app. You can check the age of data consent in your country below)
2. Get approved by your parent or guardian
3. Choose a debit card and customise it with text, stickers, and your own sketches (personalisation fees may apply), then order it from your parent's app
4. Add your card to Apple or Google Wallet to start spending straight away (minimum age restriction applies)
 
Parents and guardians, this part's for you ↓
With Revolut, they can manage their money independently, under your supervision.
Teens above the age of data consent can sign up themselves, but you'll have access to security controls, like spending notifications, in-app card freezes, and many other features to give you peace of mind.
If you have teens below the age of data consent, you can create an account for them from your Revolut app. Here’s how: 
1. Have them download this app and create an account
2. Approve their account from your Revolut app
3. Order their prepaid debit card from your app (personalisation fees may apply)

Find your country's age of data consent ↓

In Bulgaria, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Gibraltar, Iceland, Latvia, Malta, Norway, Portugal, Singapore, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, or the United States:
• Teens aged 13+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Teens aged 12 or under (minimum age restrictions apply) will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 13+

In Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Italy, Lithuania, or Spain:
• Teens aged 14+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 13 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 14+

In Australia, Czech Republic, Greece, or Slovenia:
• Teens aged 15+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 14 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 15+ (referrals subject to feature availability in your country)

In Croatia, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Romania, or Slovakia:
• Teens aged 16 and above can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those ages 15 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 16+

The Remitly app offers financial services that transcend borders, enabling family and friends to send money abroad easily. Choose from convenient delivery with approximately 470,000 cash pickup options worldwide including various currencies provided, and over 5 billion bank accounts and mobile wallets. Recipients don’t pay a fee. 

Remitly is secure and fast, with great exchange rates in 100+ currencies–no fees for recipients and low fees for sending. With guaranteed delivery time and real-time transfer updates, you’ll know the exact date and time your money will arrive with your recipient. Transfers arrive on time, or we’ll refund your fees.

Safe, secure, fast transfers:
• Multiple levels of security designed to keep you protected
• Have questions? Get quick support in our Help Center, or contact us if needed. We’re here to help 24/7.
• Get the exact date and time your money transfer will arrive

Send more money home:
• Great exchange rates
• No fees for recipients

Send money transfers worldwide:
• Serving 170+ countries worldwide, transfer money safely
• Wire funds directly to our mobile money providers, including GCash, bKash, Orange Money, MTN, Nequi, M-PAiSA, Vodafone Cash, M-Pesa, Airtel Money, eSewa, Jazzcash, Easypaisa, Maya, Tigo Pesa and more
•Send money transfers to our trusted network of banks, including Union Bank of India, Canara Bank, Bank of Baroda, Punjab National Bank, HDFC Bank, State Bank of India, Meezan Bank, UBL, Bancolombia, Banco Davivienda, Banreservas, Banco BHD León, Banco Pichincha, Banco Agricola, Banco Atlantida, Commonwealth Bank, Kasikornbank, Banco Bradesco, Banco do Brasil, Itaú Unibanco, Caixa Econômica Federal, UnionPay, Banco de Occidente and more
•Send a transfer to approximately 470,000 cash pickup options worldwide including various currencies provided, including Cebuana Lhuillier, Palawan Pawnshop, Afro International, Caribe Express, Allied Bank, Ria Money Transfer, Mukuru, Easypay, Éxito, Bancos del Barrio, Banque du Caire, Himbol Financial Services, Yonna Foreign Exchange Bureau, Banco Atlantida, Cash Plus, Wafacash, Banque Zitouna, ZB Bank and more
• Send a money transfer to India, Pakistan, the Philippines, Zimbabwe, Nigeria, Zambia, Kenya, Colombia, Ghana, Brazil, Nepal, South Africa, Poland, Dominican Republic, Thailand, Uganda, Botswana, Bangladesh, China, Morocco, Honduras, Tanzania, Ecuador and more

Remitly helps you send money worldwide and pay using your bank account, credit card, or debit card. Thanks to Remitly’s great rates, special offers, and no hidden fees, more money makes it home to friends and family. Remitly uses multiple levels of security designed to keep you protected. We’re here to help 24/7. You can talk to us or search the Help Center for support in 18 languages.

Download the Remitly app and send money today.

Remitly has offices around the globe. Remitly Global, Inc. is located at 401 Union Street, Suite 1000, Seattle, WA 98101.

Referrals must be new Remitly users and additional send requirements may be required for rewards to apply. Earn rewards for up to 20 successful referrals. Click here for program details (https://www.remitly.com/gb/en/home/referral-program-tnc).

Exelsys Mobile allows you to easily perform frequently used functions of the Exelsys Applications Suite from your mobile device. According to the user’s role in the company and the modules used the system will make available one or more of the following.

* My Approvals
You can review and approve or reject all approval requests forwarded to you for absences, expenses, timesheets, training requests etc. This function is usually available to managers of an organization.

* My Absence Requests
You can submit absence requests for approval by your manager, in the same way  as you do in the main Exelsys application, but  with the ease  of use of a touch mobile device.

* My Personal Details
You can view your employee card details including absence balances information.

* My Expenses
Allows you to enter your expense statements  and submit them from approval while on the go.

* Company Directory
Allows you to find the contact details of your fellow employees

* My Job Applications
Shows the Job Applications assigned to you to review.  You can easily carry out the interview with applicants by taking your tablet in the interview and having with you all the details related to the applicant’s CV and other details.
